verbose_text: XREF_BIBR C-reactive protein (CRP), a biomarker of inflammation, decreases with intake of both vitamins E and D. XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR Vitamin D has been shown to inhibit nuclear factor kappa B (NF-kappaB) pathway dependent transcriptional activation through activation of IkappaB-alpha, which may explain changes in CRP production.
